alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Grant; Huntington; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wabash, northwestern Grant, southwestern Whitley, western Huntington, eastern Fulton, southern Kosciusko, Cass and Miami Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rochester to 8 miles west of Mexico to near Logansport. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Logansport, Peru, Wabash, Columbia City, Rochester, North Manchester, Grissom Afb, South Whitley, Sweetser, Akron, Andrews, Walton, Swayzee, Bunker Hill, La Fontaine, Mexico, Lincoln, Wells and Sims. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central, north central and northeastern Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Grant; Huntington; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley
